movie_title: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace
title: Very GOOD !
review: I love this movie , is so great. Is for every one. I recommend this movie to anybody who want to have some fun with a good movie.Is very interesting , better than the old ones , George Lucas does a GREAT work here !!!!

title: BEST COMEDY EVER !
review: I love this movie, is a big comedy , probably the best , you will have a lot of fun watching Wayne and Garth , these dudes are really funny,  the movie had a sequel as good as the first one,and I hope to see someday 'Wayne's World 3'.

title: One of the BEST movie of 1999 !!
review: I love this movie ! I have seen it only once , but I will see it again. Fight Club should won an Oscar for the best Screenplay or the best Director - David Fincher. When you read the title FIGHT CLUB , you think is another silly Karate Movie, but of course is NOT. Is a smart movie directed by a master of this kinda movies -DAVID FINCHER ( who also direct Seven , The Game and Alien 3 ).This movie stars a few GOOD actors like : Brad Pitt , Edward Norton , Meat Loaf . Ok , is a litlle bit violent , but is verry original , you will never guess the ending . The movie is based on a book , and everybody must see it !

title: GREAT FILM
review: Jack Nicholson always stars in good films, in this one is one of his best . It is a romantic comedy , you will have fun , and you will learn something important from this film. Watch it , you will have nothing to lose !

title: Pretty good , but not as I thought...
review: When I saw that this movie won many Oscars, I was sure that this is a ROMANTIC COMEDY , a very good one , but is not , is not funny at all , I have seen better movies , I am sure that Saving Private Ryan is much better.

title: Yeah , cool!!
review: My favourite writer is Michael Crichton, and this movie is based on the book 'Eaters of the dead' by Crichton. I have seen this movie, but I have not read the book yet.The story is pretty good, and there is a lot of action, a good ride !

title: Arnold Schwarzenegger's best movie !
review: This movie is better than his sequel Terminator 2. It is SF , Thriller and also very VERY Scary. It is Schwarzenegger's best movie do date . He is so good as a Terminator robot , who must kill some women - Sharah Connor. You will enjoy this one !

title: Really COOL !
review: Really good movie, one of the best movies with Arnold Schwarzenegger, made by a perfect director for this movie: James Camereon, with an original smart story, great special effects and many more!  You will love this movie!!!!

title: Great , not as good as the first but GREAT !!!!
review: The first one brings some cool effects , smart story and it was really scary. This one is again based on a book by Michael Crichton (My favourite writer), and THE LOST WORLD is not as scary as the first one, but it has more action. Steven Spielberg does good work once again !!!!

title: The best slasher movie to date !
review: I am a BIG fan of Wes Craven , and this is a very good movie from him , maybe better than the original Scream.The great team is back (Wes Craven and Kevin Williamson) and is better and smarter than ever.Kevin does a good scary and funny script, this movie stars a great actress NEVE CAMPBELL as Sidney Prescott.She has to fight with a psycho ghost killer one more time , but not for the last time. Wes Craven is the master of these kinda movie, he likes to do it , that is why is so good.

title: Brings back the Slasher Movies !
review: Ohooo...This movie is great.The script (by Kevin Williamson) is so scary , funny, thrilling in the same time. The director Wes Craven is a master of this kinda movies, and I must say that SCREAM is his best work to date.Wes had a smart part in this movie ( the one is Freddy Kruger costume ).The end is perfect , the killer is smart  , and the heroine (Neve Campbell)is a next Lee Curtis (from Halloween).You don't need to like horror movies to see this one,It will make you laugh and it will make you SCREAM.

title: Pretty good ...
review: I like this movie , but is not as good as I thought , is not a horror , is not even a thriller , you must see it to say what it is. Bruce Willis play really good here , I love it , he is a very good actor and I like him for many years.The story of the movie is a litlle bit interesting and the movie is...pretty good..

title: I Love it !!!!!!!!!
review: This is one of my favourite movies, you have never seen anything like this , the dinosaurs are so REALISTIC so cool , Steven Spielberg does a GREAT WORK , and Michael Crichton is my favourite writer. YOU WILL LOVE IT !!!
